html: (2 Nephi 7:2)."Is my hand shortened?" The Doctrine and Covenants uses the word "arm" in place of "hand." The Lord's ability to extend His saving hands or arms is not limited. He can reach out and encompass all, without restriction. "His grasp is galactic," noted Elder Neal A. Maxwell. (CR, April 1976, p. 39; see also D&C 35:8.)
